graph_title: Proportion of domestic and industrial wastewater flows safely treated
indicator_name: Proportion of domestic and industrial wastewater flows safely treated
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Proportion of domestic and industrial wastewater flows safely treated
